full_output.summary: As a dedicated Computer Science engineering student specializing in Artificial Intelligence, I am passionate about learning and using different technologies to solve complex problems and drive innovation. My academic pursuits have equipped me with a strong foundation in C++,Python, SQL, C programming and Software Development. I strive to be adept at developing scalable solutions to real-world challenges.

certifications.title: ArIES IIT Roorkee participation certificate in Artificial Intelligence with Python

projects.name: Deep learning of mass spectrometry data for disease prediction
projects.description: Used a specialist gas analysis system- mass spectrometer which measures m/z values of molecules present in the sample. Integrated the datasets from mass spectrometry with cutting-edge machine learning techniques. By analysing this mass to charge ratio values disease prediction is done.

projects.name: WORKOUT TRACKER
projects.description: Developed a web based workout tracker. In this project we used HTML, CSS, JS, My SQL and PHP to create web pages and store the information about users and different exercises. Users can access different exercises and can view their progress.

experiences.description: As an intern at APSSDC, I actively contributed to my team project. I have learnt many new topics in Python and Data analysis. Analyzed Best streaming service app using Python, Pandas, Matplotlib, and Seaborn. Created visualizations based on ratings on different platforms.

Completed a virtual internship in Salesforce development, gaining proficiency in various modules including fundamentals, organizational setup, and more. Achieved super badges for Apex Specialist, Process Automation Specialist, and Developer Super Set.

full_output.name: Meher Ujjwala Cherukumalli
